name: Acid Splash
description: You create an acidic bubble at a point within range, where it explodes in a 5-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that Sphere must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 Acid damage.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

effects.special: Targets must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid damage.

engineHook.notes: Requires area of effect targeting and a save-for-damage mechanic.
